title: (Don't You) Forget About Me by Kate Karyus Quin
description:
Welcome to Gardnerville.

A place where no one gets sick. And no one ever dies.

Except...
ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a price to pay for paradise. Every fourth year, the strange power that fuels the town exacts its payment by infecting teens with deadly urges. In a normal year in Gardnerville, teens might stop talking to their best friends. In a fourth year, theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d kill them.

Four years ago, SkylarÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sister, Piper, was locked away after leading sixteen of her classmates to a watery grave. Since then, Skylar has lived in a numb haze, struggling to forget her past and dull the pain of losing her sister. 

But the secrets and memories Piper left behind keep taunting SkylarÃ¢â‚¬â€whispering that the only way to get her sister back is to stop GardnervilleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s murderous cycle once and for all.(

Genre: Young Adult/ Fantasy
